title: Ping
body: Up until about a week ago I've always had good ping, but this past week I've had problems every single day I try to play, with my ping staying between 200 and 500ms. I've tried all types of things online and none seem to work. Hopefully you can help solve my problems, possibly a server problem or something?

replies.body: My laptop is kinda old and internet is not that good. So i usually get 330ms or less , which is still playable for me. But for last one week i'm getting 480ms in custom games with bots and 550ms in pvp games, which is not playable. I never had this problem before. Plz help

It definitely doesn't look like a server issue since I can't find any recorded issues at the moment. Big changes in latency (ping) are almost always caused by an issue along your route to the server. Before we can take a look into that, we first need to ensure all your local settings are [**compatible with League**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues).


After you've taken those steps, if you still encounter issues, let me know so we can investigate further.

I haven't had any issues with ping until I play normals draft with friends this past week. Normal ping is usually about 89- 90 when I play ranked but now I'm getting 160-250 in normals draft. Reboot my router, reset my computer and connect into a custom but still receive high ping. My internet connection is running just fine. Seems to be a server issue to me to be honest. Hope this gets fixed
